detectors.description: Variable PiedPiperNetwork._totalSupply (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/PiedPiperNetwork.sol#44) is not in mixedCase

	- _totalSupply = 100000000 (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/PiedPiperNetwork.sol#54)

detectors.description:

	- PiedPiperNetwork.approve(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/PiedPiperNetwork.sol#73-77)

safeDiv(uint256,uint256) should be declared external:
